thread.title: Kevin Boateng set to play for AC Milan in friendly against rivals Inter Milan in Liugi Berlusconi Cup match tonight
thread.title_full: Kevin Boateng set to play for AC Milan in friendly against rivals Inter Milan in Liugi Berlusconi Cup match tonight

title: Kevin Boateng set to play for AC Milan in friendly against rivals Inter Milan in Liugi Berlusconi Cup match tonight
text:
FIFA 2010 Sports News | 21 October 2015 12:10 CET Kevin Boateng set to play for AC Milan in friendly against rivals Inter Milan in Liugi Berlusconi Cup match tonight - www.ghanasoccernet.com Kevin-Prince Boateng 
Kevin-Prince Boateng is expected to feature for AC Milan in a friendly against rivals Inter Milan in the Liugi Berlusconi Cup match on Wednesday night. 
The 28-year-old, who is training with Milan, will be handed another chance to impress manager 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
